title: Anno 1701 (uk/rus version) D.E.A.P !70! mod fix
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
REUPLOAD! ITS WORKING NOW. THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH THE FILE ENCRYPTION. 
(sorry (-_-) )
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:

this is a fixed version of the anno 1701 (1701 AD) modification D.E.A.P !70! for the uk/rus version of the game.

the mod adds new buldings, ships, ui, fixes the ai, ads new trader assignments and so on...

but especially on uk no cd versions the mod bugged alot:

ressources were not shown properly, you could see but not build the new ships and the ai allways spammed about your threatening ships even if u didnt even have a ship.. 

because there was/is absolutly no support from the anno forumus and one (annozone) even talked shit about how its not even possible to fix and crap like that...
i was basicly pissed and did it myself.



you need to install a uk or rus version of the game ( for example this one http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4692119/Anno_1701 )

(don't apply a crack)

then patch it to version 1.04 (offical legal patch you can find it everywhere)

(still don't apply a crack)

extract the exe from the DEAP.7z from this torrent (using for example .. who would have guessed.. 7zip o.O)
(pass = putin4ever)

finally use the exe and follow the instructions

play the game



(dunno if somone still cares about this game.. but i love this game so if i help at least 1 person with this its probably worth it)

btw lan works without any problems for online play simply use tunngle also works like a charm.
